document.full_text: lockheed martin corp, the u.s. government's top information technology provider, said on saturday that it detected and thwarted "a significant and tenacious attack" on its information systems network one week ago.
document.title: lockheed says thwarted "tenacious" cyber attack
lines_and_colors: lockheed martin corp, the u.s. government's top information technology provider, said on saturday that it detected and thwarted "a significant and tenacious attack" on its information systems network one week ago.
